document_data.name: Dorikel
document_data.mainbody:
'''Dorikel''' was an Adept of [[the Absolute]], stationed in the [[Moonrise Towers]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I've never been to battle. I've never been to war. But I feel so... calm. Ready.''|Adept Dorikel}}
document_data.Description: Dorikel wore the uniform [[armor]] of an Adept of the Absolute – a night-blue armored garb and a cowled high-raising helmet. He had [[drow]]ic dark gray skin and red eyes..
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Adept Dorikel was among those who joined the new religion that sprang in the [[Western Heartlands]]. He was stationed within the Moonrise Towers, along the stairs towards one of the towers' entrances. The fortress was controlled by the Absolute's warlord – General [[Ketheric Thorm]]. Like many other members of the cult, Dorikel's fate remained unknown as he could've perished in battle when the [[High Harper]] [[Jaheira]] and her [[True Soul]] allies stormed the Moonrise.
